channel.title: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]
channel.description: How do I make it so when a staff member or donator logs in, it sends a message to everyone online? Thanks.

item.title: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote="+tyco+, post:8, topic:382056"]What about if a staff member logs out? can this be done?

Thanks.[/quote]This is a server help section not a tutorial, why did you gravedigg this and post here?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]
item.dc:creator: @xxifish_i_x xxifish i x
item.description:
@xxifish_i_x wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:4, topic:382056”]I got it figured out. Thanks Vain.

Here’s code if anyone else wants it.

I’ll add to snippets section, too.

Search for

if (addStarter) getPA().addStarter();
In Client.java

Then add this under that

if(playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[OWNER] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } } if(playerRights == 2) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[ADMIN] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } } if(playerRights == 1) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[MOD] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } }[/quote]

woah thanks mate!
just u messed up on the colours gfx’s…
so yea other then that thanks!
works perfect

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]

item.title: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]
item.dc:creator: @defyant17 defyant17
item.description:
@defyant17 wrote:

How do I do this for Delta?

EDIT: Got it… i did this very ghetto, Lol.
Here if you want it:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLayerName")) { yell("@bla@[@red@"+playerName+"@bla@]@bla@ The Server Owner, Coder, and Hoster ______ Has Logged In!"); }

Like i said…ghetto.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I got it figured out. Thanks Vain.

Here’s code if anyone else wants it.

I’ll add to snippets section, too.

Search for

if (addStarter) getPA().addStarter();
In Client.java

Then add this under that

if(playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[OWNER] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } } if(playerRights == 2) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[ADMIN] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } } if(playerRights == 1) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("@blu@[MOD] " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Message To All When Staff Member Logs In[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Find the initialize method, put this in it:

if (/* condition */) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(properName + " has just logged in."); } } }
The /* condition */ comment is where you put the playerRights == # or donator variable[/quote]
Where do I put that code?

Read full topic
